Venezuela's sudden policy change may stem from waning support for Maduro, sources sayVenezuela's recent abrupt reversal in its nascent rapprochement with the United States and domestic opponents is likely a response to declining support among its traditional base, according to sources close to the ruling party, voters and analysts. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:06:06 GMT F5DFM6SRURL4JJBY7ACNJIR3XE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuelas-sudden-policy-change-may-stem-waning-support-maduro-sources-say-2024-02-26/Mayela Armas, Vivian Sequera世界美洲
Russian prosecutor seeks nearly 3 years in jail for rights campaigner OrlovA Russian prosecutor requested a prison term of two years and 11 months on Monday for veteran human rights activist Oleg Orlov, who is on trial for discrediting Russia's armed forces, the Memorial human rights organisation said. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:32:04 GMT U6P2HAUEFBOSHGBY3EUX6VRCOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-prosecutor-seeks-nearly-3-years-jail-rights-campaigner-orlov-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel court hears challenges to religious draft waiver amid Gaza warThe top Israeli court heard challenges on Monday to exemptions granted to ultra-Orthodox Jews from military conscription, a long-standing source of friction with more secular citizens now stoked by the country's costly mobilisation in the Gaza war. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:08:50 GMT T7YHW4FXJVLC3K6T7SGXKNOUGI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-court-hears-challenges-religious-draft-waiver-amid-gaza-war-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中东
Explainer: Can Ukraine supporters force a US House vote on foreign aid?If U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Mike Johnson refuses to allow a vote on the $95 billion foreign security aid bill passed by the Senate, its supporters may turn to rarely used and complicated procedural tools to try to force a vote. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:05:07 GMT O5BMHVUMPBALEA75FPZIA4QZE https://www.reuters.com/world/can-ukraine-supporters-force-us-house-vote-foreign-aid-2024-02-26/Patricia Zengerle世界
Navalny was close to being freed in prisoner swap, says allyRussian opposition politician Alexei Navalny was close to being freed in a prisoner swap at the time of his death, a close ally said on Monday, repeating an allegation by his family and supporters that President Vladimir Putin had him killed. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 11:00:57 GMT 2OO3RRSQGROCTLLPRAVRMGE4EE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalny-was-close-being-freed-prisoner-swap-says-ally-2024-02-26/Filipp Lebedev, Andrew Osborn世界欧洲
Kremlin calls claim that Russia pressured Alexei Navalny's mother absurdThe Kremlin on Monday called allegations that Russian authorities had pressured the mother of Alexei Navalny over her son's funeral absurd, saying President Vladimir Putin had not been involved in decisions on Navalny's body. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:59:40 GMT NHJSU7ZZBNJZDIQNVAT5SY236A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-calls-claim-that-Russia-Pressured-alexei-navalnys-mother-absurd-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Israel strikes deeper into Lebanon as Hezbollah downs droneIsrael carried out airstrikes in Lebanon's Bekaa Valley on Monday, killing at least two Hezbollah members in its deepest attack yet into Lebanese territory since hostilities erupted with the Iran-backed group last October, sources in Lebanon said. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:52:26 GMT H4S5CSPUMVLEXF3BHUHSOX4QXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-strikes-deeper-into-lebanon-hezbollah-downs-drone-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中东
Russia says idea of Ukraine peace talks without Moscow is absurdThe Kremlin said on Monday that the idea of holding peace talks without Russia was ridiculous, after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said he hoped to hold a spring summit in Switzerland to discuss his peace vision with Kyiv's allies. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:43:51 GMT MNZCPRATBRNJ3MQF63K32JIXXI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-idea-ukraine-peace-talks-without-moscow-is-absurd-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine military confirms retreat from eastern villageThe Ukrainian military confirmed on Monday its retreat from the village of Lastochkyne in eastern Ukraine, saying the move would help it halt the westward advance of Russian forces. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:32:09 GMT GDW3FH7PEBMHZFULYE33MHNMWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-military-confirms-retreat-eastern-village-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Kremlin shrugs off latest Western sanctions against RussiaThe Kremlin on Monday shrugged off the latest round of Western sanctions against Moscow, saying that Russia's economy had adapted to restrictions and that those imposing sanctions were hurting themselves with any new measures. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 10:30:55 GMT EVSIBR3TWRI2NDU7YTJPTV5YXY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/kremlin-shrugs-off-latest-western-sanctions-against-Russia-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Nawaz Sharif's daughter elected to head Pakistan's Punjab, seen as stepping stoneMaryam Nawaz, the daughter of Pakistan's three-time former prime minister Nawaz Sharif, was elected on Monday as the head of the country's most populous province, Punjab, in a move underlining the expanding grip of the family in the South Asian nation. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 09:57:56 GMT BQM3NYRC4FO2TPCSQVXXGL7ZUI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/nawaz-sharifs-daughter-elected-head-pakistans-punjab-seen-stepping-stone-2024-02-26/Asif Shahzad, Mubasher Bukhari世界亚太地区
